field.name: unparsedInsertString
field.String: ${selection} <listPerson> <person> <persName ref="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[1]/@ref)}"/> <${ask('Type "birth" or "death"', input_type, 'death')}> <choice> <reg><date when="${ask('Gregorian (regularized) date, with leading 0, e.g., 0950', input_type, 'default_value')}" calendar="Gregorian"><!-- insert Gregorian date --></date></reg> <orig><date when="${ask('Hijri date from text, with leading 0, e.g., 0950', input_type, 'default_value')}" calendar="Hijri"><!-- insert Hijri date --></date></orig> </choice> <note type="desc"> <persName ref="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[1]/@ref)}"> <!--insert person name--></persName> <!--was born/died --> <!-- optional place --> at <placeName ref="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//placeName[1]/@ref)}"><!--insert place name--></placeName>. </note> </${ask('Type "birth" or "death" (must be same as previous)', input_type, 'death')}> </person> </listPerson>

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: Adds birthDate/deathDate factoid content for a selected person

field.name: unparsedInsertString
field.String: ${selection} <listPerson> <person> <persName ref="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[1]/@ref)}"/> <${ask('Type "birth" or "death"', input_type, 'death')}> <placeName ref="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//placeName[1]/@ref)}"/> <note type="desc"> <persName ref="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[1]/@ref)}"><!--insert person name--></persName> <!-- was born in/died in --> <placeName ref="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//placeName[1]/@ref)}"><!--insert place name--></placeName>. </note> </${ask('Type "birth" or "death" (must be same as previous)', input_type, 'death')}> </person> </listPerson>

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: Adds birthPlace/deathPlace factoid content for a selected person and place URI

field.name: unparsedInsertString
field.String: ${selection} <event ana="http://syriaca.org/keyword/${ask('Enter the final part of the keyword URI to be added to http://syriaca.org/keyword/', input_type, '')}"> <desc> In <choice> <reg><date when="${ask('Gregorian (regularized) date, with leading 0, e.g., 0950', input_type, 'default_value')}" calendar="Gregorian"><!-- insert Gregorian date --></date></reg> <orig><date when="${ask('Hijri date from text, with leading 0, e.g., 0950', input_type, 'default_value')}" calendar="Hijri"><!-- insert Hijri date --></date></orig> </choice>, <persName ref="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[1]/@ref)}"><!--insert person name--></persName> <!--insert description of event --> at <!-- optional place --><placeName ref="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//placeName[1]/@ref)}"><!--insert place name--></placeName>.</desc> </event>

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: Adds event factoid content for a selected person and place

field.name: unparsedInsertString
field.String: ${xpath_eval(replace(//div[starts-with(idno,'https://usaybia.net/factoid')][last()]/idno/text(),'(https://usaybia.net/factoid/\d+-\d+-).*','$1'))}${xpath_eval(string(max(//div/@xml:id/number(replace(.,'factoid-','')))+1))} ${xpath_eval(//div[bibl/ptr][last()]/bibl/ptr)} ${ask('part number', input_type, '${xpath_eval(//div[bibl/citedRange][last()]/bibl/citedRange/text())}')}

field.name: unparsedInsertString
field.String: ${selection} <listPerson> <person> <persName ref="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[1]/@ref)}"/> <occupation ana="http://syriaca.org/keyword/${ask('Enter the final part of the keyword URI to be added to http://syriaca.org/keyword/', input_type, '')}"> <note><persName ref="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[1]/@ref)}"><!--insert person name--></persName> was <!-- occupation --> <!-- optional place --> at <placeName ref="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//placeName[1]/@ref)}"><!--insert place name--></placeName>. </note> </occupation> </person> </listPerson>

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: Adds occupation factoid content for a selected person

field.name: unparsedInsertString
field.String: ${selection} <listRelation> <relation ref="http://syriaca.org/keyword/${ask('Enter the final part of the keyword URI to be added to http://syriaca.org/keyword/', input_type, '')}" mutual="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[1]/@ref)} ${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[2]/@ref)}"> <desc> <persName ref="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[1]/@ref)}"> ${xpath_eval(doc('../../persons/tei/${xpath_eval(replace(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[1]/@ref,'https://usaybia.net/person/',''))}.xml')//persName[@*='#syriaca-headword' and starts-with(@xml:lang, 'en-')]/text())} </persName> <!--describe relationship in short phrase, e.g., "corresponded with"--> <persName ref="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[2]/@ref)}"> ${xpath_eval(doc('../../persons/tei/${xpath_eval(replace(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[2]/@ref,'https://usaybia.net/person/',''))}.xml')//persName[@*='#syriaca-headword' and starts-with(@xml:lang, 'en-')]/text())} </persName>. </desc> </relation> </listRelation>

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: Adds a mutual relation factoid between two selected URIs

field.name: unparsedInsertString
field.String: ${selection} <listRelation> <relation ref="http://syriaca.org/keyword/${ask('Enter the final part of the keyword URI to be added to http://syriaca.org/keyword/', input_type, '')}" active="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[1]/@ref)}" passive="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[2]/@ref)}"> <desc> <persName ref="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[1]/@ref)}"><!--insert person 1 name--></persName> <!--describe relationship in short phrase, e.g., "corresponded with"--> <persName ref="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[2]/@ref)}"><!--insert person 2 name--></persName>. </desc> </relation> </listRelation>

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: Adds an active-passive (person1 is active) relation factoid between two selected URIs

field.name: unparsedInsertString
field.String: ${selection} <listRelation> <relation ref="http://syriaca.org/keyword/${ask('Enter the final part of the keyword URI to be added to http://syriaca.org/keyword/', input_type, '')}" active="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[2]/@ref)}" passive="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[1]/@ref)}"> <desc> <persName ref="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[2]/@ref)}"><!--insert person 2 name--></persName> <!--describe relationship in short phrase, e.g., "corresponded with"--> <persName ref="${xpath_eval(parse-xml('<temp>${selection}</temp>')//persName[1]/@ref)}"><!--insert person 1 name--></persName>. </desc> </relation> </listRelation>

field.name: descriptionString
field.String: Adds an active-passive (person2 is active) relation factoid between two selected URIs
